resources.string: To the salt solution, dil.HCl is added and heated
H{2}S is boiled off. NH{4}Cl and NH{4}OH are added to make medium alkaline (Check alkalinity using litmus paper)
H{2}S is passed in alkaline medium
H{2}S is boiled off and (NH{4}){2}CO{3} is added
To the filtrate of Group V, Na{2}HPO{4} is added
